Texts.Chs:
他们的造物被淹没在了历史的长河中，这恰巧适合他们，因为他们更喜欢原始的存在状态，中世纪文化使他们更倾向于使用盾牌、钉头锤和弩进行训练。

  ^orange;食性^reset;：机械食性/杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
  防御 x^green;1.06^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;%物理、毒素和击退抗性,  +^cyan;14^reset;% 火炎抗性, +^cyan;5^reset;% 辐射抗性
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;：中毒&蜂蜇

^orange;环境^reset;：
  ^green;油/原体液/厄尔吉斯液态燃料^reset;：HP & 能量回复、能量 x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^red;山脉^reset;生物群落: 防御 x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
  锤系专精: +^green;25^reset;%
  弓系专精: +^green;10^reset;%
  每连击+^green;2^reset;防御
  举盾：+^green;3^reset; 防御
  完美格挡时^green;增加大量伤害^reset;(叠乘)
  盾牌反击时^green;回复生命^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;：
  感电：攻击&能量-^red;50^reset;%
^red;抗性^reset;: ^red;-30^reset;%电系
Texts.Eng:
Their creation is lost to history. This suits them just fine, as they prefer a primitive state of being. Their medieval culture favors training with shields, maces and crossbows.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Robotic/Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Defense x^green;1.06^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;% Physical, Poison, Knockback, +^cyan;14^reset;% Fire, +^cyan;5^reset;% Radiation
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Poison, Bee Stings

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Oil/Liquid Proto/Erchius^reset;: Health & E. Regen, Energy x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^red;Mountainous^reset; biomes: Defense x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Hammer Mastery: +^green;25^reset;%
  Bow Mastery: +^green;10^reset;%
  1h combos increase defense by +^green;2^reset;
  Shield (Raised): +^green;3^reset; Defense
  Perfect Blocks ^green;increase damage^reset; (stacks)
  Shield Bashes ^green;restore health^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Electrified: -^red;50^reset;% Power and Energy
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Electric
